title: THE HUNT Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: FUN FACT: The 1907 Heidsieck champagne featured in the movie is estimated at $275,000 a bottle.🍾
I loved how they kept killing everyone in the beginning, it really keeps the audience engaged and makes you wonder who is the actual main character
I loved the movie. A true dark comedy. It was so over the top. "Should you get mercy just because you are a woman?" "No!" Boom.
Probably why this move has a 50/50 RT score and audience score, it pissed off each side equally.
The movie was funny. Emma Roberts has the entire opening but she died immediately. So funny but great and rewatchable.
description:
In this ending explained we take a deep dive into Blumhouse's latest horror film which was delayed last summer "The Hunt". We'll review and recap the story along as an analysis into the ending.
